item.description:
Hello Canucks,

This month we are going to be watching Hockey and more Hockey as Canada is going for GOLD at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver. The second game is against Switzerland and we can watch the game with sound on at the Tavern in the Square. For this event I need an ACCURATE headcount so I can tell the bar how many people to expect. They have a private room that has a separate TV, so it should be perfect for your group.

Please make sure you RSVP so we know how many people will be joining us.

Hope you can make it!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian February Meetup
